1.3.0.name: connect20/alsoviewed
1.3.0.description: Products recommendation module, that shows products viewed by customers who viewed this product.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

1.2.0.name: connect20/alsoviewed
1.2.0.description: Magento module that displays products, viewed by visitors, who viewed this product. It can also show recommendations based on viewed, compared and shopping cart products.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
